snippet.title: Missing Hiker Trailer
snippet.description:
Missing Hiker is a short indie horror game, where your brother Ethan went missing while hiking and you try to find him. The weather is very cold, so you need to find him quickly, otherwise he could succumb to the elements.

Will be released for free on Itch.io and Steam.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2250090/Missing_Hiker/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MrGemezl

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
